title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
Introducing the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds â€“ your ultimate sleep companion! These earbuds are designed with comfort and functionality in mind, providing a peaceful and uninterrupted sleep experience.

**Comfortable and Slim Design:**

Ideal for side sleepers, the Sleep A10 earbuds boast a slim and lightweight design that ensures all-night comfort without any discomfort or irritation. The snug fit ensures the earbuds stay in place without protruding, making them perfect for indoor use.

**4-Point Noise Masking System:**

Experience the power of the 4-Point Noise Masking System, which works to effectively block out unwanted noise without active noise cancelling. With ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips, these earbuds create a secure seal, ensuring a peaceful sleep environment.

**Smart Volume Control:**

The Sleep A10 earbuds feature smart volume control, which automatically adjusts the volume of your sleep sounds to effectively mask external noise, providing a more immersive sleep experience.

**Bluetooth 5.2 and soundcore App Integration:**

Connect to your devices seamlessly with Bluetooth 5.2 technology. Enjoy unlimited sleep sounds with the soundcore app, which allows you to customize your sleep experience with a variety of white noise and soothing sounds.

**Customized Sleep Sounds:**

The Sleep A10 earbuds come with customized dynamic drivers that produce enhanced low-frequency sounds, 10dB lower than standard ones, ensuring a more restful sleep.

**Sleep Monitoring and Personal Alarm:**

Monitor your sleep status with the built-in sleep monitor, which provides feedback on your sleep duration and quality. The earbuds also feature an automatic pause function that stops the audio once you fall asleep. Plus, with the personal alarm feature, you can wake up without disturbing others.

Experience the future of sleep technology with the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Order yours today!
